quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Run to GOD first if things get shacky and in good times too.
author: Kimberly Tapfumaneyi

quote: Going to church doesn't make you a Christian any more than standing in a garage makes you a car.

quote: God loves each of us as if there were only one of us.
author: Augustine

quote: A thorough knowledge of the Bible is worth more than a college education.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Prayer is the most important conversation of your day. Take it to God before you take it to anyone else.

quote: If God is your co-pilot, switch seats.
author: Michael P. Watson
